problem_names: lemma pointwiseI[intro]: "(\<And> x. P (m x) (m' x)) \<Longrightarrow> pointwise P m m'"
translations: lemma pointwiseI[intro]: "(\<And> x. P (m x) (m' x)) \<Longrightarrow> pointwise P m m'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>x. P (m x) (m' x)) \<Longrightarrow> pointwise P m m'

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>x. P (m x) (m' x)) \<Longrightarrow> \<forall>x. P (m x) (m' x)
